author: ssekmen
body:
Enabled checking uTCA FEDs for calibration information in addition to the VME FEDs.
Calibration information to be taken from uTCA FEDs by default.  When this does not exist, VME calibration information is taken.
Possible differences between uTCA and VME calibration information is also checked, and a warning is issued in case of differences.
title: Add uTCA FEDs to check for calibration type
